mapper.select: SELECT hotel_id, hotel_name, hotel_address, hotel_phonenum, hotel_rate, hotel_info, hotel_detail, hotel_website, hotel_x, hotel_y, location_id FROM hotels ORDER BY hotel_id
SELECT (select count(user_id) from users) "total_user", (SELECT count(review_id) from reviews) "total_review", (select count(reservation_id) from reservations) "total_reservation" FROM dual
select TO_CHAR(reservation_start_day,'mm') "reserve_month", count(reservation_id) "reserve_count" from reservations group by TO_CHAR(reservation_start_day,'mm')

select (case when(total_price>=100000 and 200000>total_price) then '100000~200000' when (total_price>=200000 and 300000>total_price) then '200000~300000' when (total_price>=300000 and 400000>total_price) then '300000~400000' else '400000이상' end) "pay_divde", count(payment_id) "pay_count" from payments group by (case when(total_price>=100000 and 200000>total_price) then '100000~200000' when (total_price>=200000 and 300000>total_price) then '200000~300000' when (total_price>=300000 and 400000>total_price) then '300000~400000' else '400000이상' end)

SELECT loc.location_name hotel_name, count(loc.location_id) hotel_count FROM reservations reserve inner join rooms room on reserve.room_id=room.room_id inner join hotels on room.HOTEL_ID = hotels.HOTEL_ID inner join locations loc on hotels.LOCATION_ID = loc.LOCATION_ID GROUP BY loc.location_name
